summary: A kind and hardworking student joins to Hababam Sinifi (The Chaos Class) but they don't accept him as one of them and he becomes the target of all class' pranks.
cast: Tayfun Akalin|Tuncay Akça|Halit Akçatepe|Sitki Akçatepe|Sevket Altug|Ahmet Ariman|Ertugrul Bilda|Ihsan Bilsev|Talat Dumanli|Cem Gürdap|Muharrem Gürses|Bülent Igdiroglu|Hayri Karabey|Hakki Karadayi|Adile Nasit|Cengiz Nezir|Ergin Orbey|Feridun Savli|Sener Sen|Ahmet Sezerel|Kemal Sunal|Münir Özkul|Akil Öztuna
title: Hababam Sinifi Uyaniyor
